mapper.select: select id, sec_uid as secUid, nickname, last_seen_time as lastSeenTime from room_user_user where sec_uid = #{secUid} limit 1
mapper.insert: insert into room_user_user (sec_uid, nickname, last_seen_time) values (#{secUid}, #{nickname}, #{lastSeenTime}) on duplicate key update nickname = values(nickname), last_seen_time = values(last_seen_time)
